about_the_game:
The capacity of GunStar's Gambit to provide players an sensation of constant, incremental progress and forward momentum even while they're idle is what makes it so captivating. These games can be left running in the background while a player attends to other chores. They can return at a later time to gather their resources and use them to purchase further improvements. The reward centers of the brain are triggered by this "idle" gameplay loop, which results in an unquenchable urge to click.

Wealth seekers and explorers alike have been enthralled with the tantalizing and exhilarating idea of finding hidden wealth every three hours. Fairy tales and legends are made on the very notion of finding priceless relics, priceless gems, or even lost fortunes on a regular, almost clockwork-like schedule. But, the alluring prospect of discovering such a cache of unexpected riches almost constantly could prove to be the experience of a lifetime for anyone brave enough to accept the task.

Features
(Clicker)
(Multiplier every 100 Clicks)

(Drops are currently in progress)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 5500 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 391.54 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 391.54 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 10500 / AMD Ryzen 7+
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: "Really it's just a Clicker Game." But.. The thrilling prospect of discovering hidden gold every three hours has captivated both adventurers and wealth seekers. GunStar's Gambit to provide players and sensation of constant and incremental progress.
